testcase.name: As a manager, I should not be able to save a room reservation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed And Click on Log in link....................................................passed And Click on user name text box and type it "manager2"......................passed And Click on password name text box and type it "Man1ager2!"................passed And Click login button......................................................passed And Click on System Management dropdown button..............................passed And Click on the room reservation button....................................passed And Click on add room reservation...........................................passed And Click on idUser and select valid item "cihannuma".......................passed And click on selectHotelRoom and select valid item "MARIA"..................passed And click on price and type valid number "500"..............................passed And click on dateStart and select valid item "08/29/2020"...................passed And click on dateEnd and select valid item "09/05/2020"....................passed And click on AdultAmount and type valid number "2"..........................passed And click on ChildrenAmount and type valid number "1".......................passed And click on ContactNameSurname and type valid surname "gocer"..............passed And click on ContactPhone and type valid phone number "0545 545 45 45"......passed And click on Contact Email and type invalid email ""........................passed And click on Notes and type valid information "thank you"...................passed And click on Approved button................................................passed And click on is paid button.................................................passed And click on save button....................................................passed Then verify the new message.................................................passed
